__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Akinji
data.description:
Highly mobile long ranged cavalry which fires two arrows in quick succession. 
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units
data.descriptionCN:
高机动性的远程骑兵，可快速连续发射两支箭。
+ 高机动性
- 不擅长对抗远程单位

data.name: Veteran Akinji
data.description:
Highly mobile long ranged cavalry which fires two arrows in quick succession. 
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units
data.descriptionCN:
高机动性的远程骑兵，可快速连续发射两支箭。
+ 高机动性
- 不擅长对抗远程单位

data.description:
Highly mobile long ranged cavalry which fires two arrows in quick succession. 
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units
data.descriptionCN:
高机动性的远程骑兵，可快速连续发射两支箭。
+ 高机动性
- 不擅长对抗远程单位

data.name: Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 射速高
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Veteran Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 射速高
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Elite Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 射速高
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
耐久的步兵运输工具，擅长对付建筑及城墙。
+ 高远程护甲
+ 高生命值
- 只能通过近战攻击受到额外的伤害
- 只能攻击建筑
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Carrack
data.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with broadside cannons.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Low movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
装备有船侧加农炮的大型有帆战船。
+ 反建筑专家
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units
data.descriptionCN:
强大的攻城器械，擅长从极远的距离摧毁建筑及城墙。
+ 对建筑有伤害加成
- 必须架设才能开火
- 无法精准命中单位

data.name: Crossbowman
data.description:
High damage ranged unit best against heavy targets.
+ Anti-heavy specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
高伤害远程单位，最适合对付重型目标。
+ 反重型专家
- 生命值低
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Elite Crossbowman
data.description:
High damage ranged unit best against heavy targets.
+ Anti-heavy specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
高伤害远程单位，最适合对付重型目标。
+ 反重型专家
- 生命值低
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Demolition Ship
data.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction
data.descriptionCN:
装满炸药的小船。被歼灭后会爆炸，对区域内的所有单位造成伤害。
- 离爆炸中心越远造成伤害越低
- 自毁是唯一武器

data.name: Dhow
data.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology
data.descriptionCN:
载有步弓手的轻型战船。
+ 操控性和速度提升。
+ 可从铁匠铺的远程伤害科技中获得加成。

data.name: Fishing Boat
data.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
从深海鱼群或海岸鱼群采集食物的小型船只。在码头处存放采集到的资源。
+ 可以修理
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Grand Galley
data.description:
Large oared vessel which can be upgraded into a naval Military School.
+ Large hold which can be garrisoned by any unit once upgraded into a Military School
+ Very long range
- Lower damage
data.descriptionCN:
大型带桨船只，可升级为一所海军军事学校。
+ 大型船舱，升级到军事学校后任何单位都能驻扎
+ 攻击范围极远
 - 较低的伤害

data.name: Great Bombard
data.description:
Largest cannon that can be fielded. Excellent against buildings or groups of targets.
+ High damage
+ Area damage
+ Long Range
- Must be set up to fire
data.descriptionCN:
可供部署的最大型加农炮，非常适合对付建筑或目标群。
+ 高伤害
+ 范围伤害
+ 远射程
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Hulk
data.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability
data.descriptionCN:
配备船侧弩炮的船只。
+ 很擅长对付步弓手船
- 操控性较低

data.name: Imam
data.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
不具备战斗能力的辅助单位，可拾取圣物、招降敌方单位及占领圣地。
+ 可治疗友方单位
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Janissary
data.description:
Powerful infantry effective against cavalry and can repair siege engines.
+ High damage
+ Bonus damage against cavalry
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Receives additional damage from Archers.
data.descriptionCN:
强大的步兵，擅长对抗骑兵，可以修复攻城器械。
+ 高伤害
+ 对抗骑兵时可获得伤害加成
- 高成本
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到来自弓兵的额外伤害

data.name: Elite Janissary
data.description:
Powerful infantry effective against cavalry and can repair siege engines.
+ High damage
+ Bonus damage against cavalry
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Receives additional damage from Archers.
data.descriptionCN:
强大的步兵，擅长对抗骑兵，可以修复攻城器械。
+ 高伤害
+ 对抗骑兵时可获得伤害加成
- 高成本
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到来自弓兵的额外伤害

data.name: Lancer
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
拥有高杀伤力和近战护甲的昂贵骑兵。擅长对付近战单位。
+ 重型护甲
+ 近战能力强大
- 会受到长矛兵及弩手克制

data.name: Elite Lancer
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
拥有高杀伤力和近战护甲的昂贵骑兵。擅长对付近战单位。
+ 重型护甲
+ 近战能力强大
- 会受到长矛兵及弩手克制

data.name: Man-at-Arms
data.description:
Tough infantry with good damage.
+ High armor
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
强悍的步兵，具有良好的杀伤力。
+ 高护甲
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑士、火枪骑兵和弩手克制

data.name: Elite Man-at-Arms
data.description:
Tough infantry with good damage.
+ High armor
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
强悍的步兵，具有良好的杀伤力。
+ 高护甲
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑士、火枪骑兵和弩手克制

data.name: Mangonel
data.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
- Must be set up to fire
data.descriptionCN:
可发射多枚炮弹对范围区域造成伤害。
+ 擅长对付成群的单位
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Mehter
data.description:
War drummer that enhances units in an area, except Villagers and Traders.
+ War drum military enhancements
+ High movement speed
- No weapons
data.descriptionCN:
战鼓手将会为范围内的除村民和商人之外的友军单位提供增益。
+ 战鼓军事增益
+ 高移动速度
- 没有武器

data.name: Ribauldequin
data.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.
+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley
- Short range
- Low ranged armor
data.descriptionCN:
有五根炮管的火药武器，擅长对付成群的单位。能对建筑造成少量伤害。
+ 单次齐射可击中多个目标
- 攻击范围短
- 远程护甲较低

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat
data.descriptionCN:
轻武装骑兵，擅长探索世界、狩猎野生动物及牧羊。
+ 能看穿浓密森林
+ 具有生命值恢复能力
+ 高移动速度
- 战斗能力非常弱

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
高大的步兵运输工具，不具备战斗能力。允许将其中驻扎的步兵直接投放到石墙上。
+ 高远程护甲
- 无法攻击
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Sipahi
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Can gain attack speed at the cost of melee defense.
+ High movement speed
+ Strong against ranged units
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼和反制远程单位。可牺牲近战防御来提高攻击速度。
+ 高移动速度
+ 擅长对抗远程单位
- 不擅长对抗近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Veteran Sipahi
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Can gain attack speed at the cost of melee defense.
+ High movement speed
+ Strong against ranged units
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼和反制远程单位。可牺牲近战防御来提高攻击速度。
+ 高移动速度
+ 擅长对抗远程单位
- 不擅长对抗近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Elite Sipahi
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Can gain attack speed at the cost of melee defense.
+ High movement speed
+ Strong against ranged units
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼和反制远程单位。可牺牲近战防御来提高攻击速度。
+ 高移动速度
+ 擅长对抗远程单位
- 不擅长对抗近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.name: Hardened Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.description:

+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings
data.descriptionCN:
反单位攻城武器。能发射可穿透多个单位的弩箭。
+ 无需架设即可发射
+ 对近战步兵造成额外伤害
- 对建筑造成的伤害极低

data.name: Trade Ship
data.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
商船在被派往有海岸贸易站或其他玩家码头的贸易路线时，可产生黄金和木材。
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Trader
data.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.
data.descriptionCN:
商人通过在他们的本国市场和贸易站或其他玩家的市场之间的往来产生黄金。本国市场和贸易目的地之间的距离越远，产生的黄金就越多。
本国市场或贸易目的地可以随时更改。

data.name: Transport Ship
data.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
大型带桨船只，可运送陆上单位渡过水域。
+ 任何单位都能驻扎
+ 使用驻扎于其中的单位的视野范围
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat
data.descriptionCN:
采集木材、食物、石料和黄金。建造并修理建筑，也可修理攻城器械和海军单位。
- 战斗能力弱
